IF WE BURN, HONG KONG BURN WITH US
If we burn, Hong Kong burn with us!!

Chinese government involves in terrorism in Hong Kong
HK: Right outside of Nam Pin Wai, where the attackers retreated to after the terrorist attack on 21/7, a car (car number TP8431) was discovered on 26/7, alongside a Chinese Liberation Army hat, rattan canes(commonly used by attackers on 21/7), a katana and other weapons. An electricity bill of “Yip Foo” (è‘‰è™) with registered address in Nam Pin Wai was also discovered. The name is shared by a senior official of Chinese Liaison office responsible for the region, suggesting China’s involvement in the terrorist attack on 21/7.
